command.name: moveTo
command.summary: Moves the pen to a specified position.
command.param: The x-coordinate to move to.
The y-coordinate to move to.

command.name: drawTo
command.summary: Draws a line from the current position to a specified position.
command.param: The x-coordinate to draw to.
The y-coordinate to draw to.

command.name: clear
command.summary: Clears the drawing area, resetting it to a blank state.

command.name: rectangle
command.summary: Draws a rectangle at the current position.
command.param: The width of the rectangle.
The height of the rectangle.

command.name: circle
command.summary: Draws a circle centered at the current position.
command.param: The radius of the circle.

command.name: triangle
command.summary: Draws a triangle based on the provided vertices' coordinates.
command.param: The x-coordinate of the first vertex.
The y-coordinate of the first vertex.
The x-coordinate of the second vertex.
The y-coordinate of the second vertex.
The x-coordinate of the third vertex.
The y-coordinate of the third vertex.

command.name: color
command.summary: Sets the color of the pen for drawing.
command.param: The name of the color to set the pen to.

command.name: reset
command.summary: Resets the pen position to the initial starting point (usually the top-left corner).

command.name: fill
command.summary: Toggles the fill mode for shapes, determining whether they are filled or not.
command.param: The desired fill state, 'on' to enable filling and 'off' to disable it.

command.name: var
command.summary: Declares a new variable with a specified initial value.
command.param: The name of the variable to declare.
The initial value of the variable.

command.name: set
command.summary: Sets the value of an existing variable.
command.param: The name of the variable to set.
The new value to assign to the variable.

command.name: if
command.summary: Evaluates a condition and skips to the corresponding 'endif' if the condition is false.
command.param: The condition to evaluate.

command.name: endif
command.summary: Marks the end of an 'if' block.

command.name: loop
command.summary: Begins a loop block which repeats until 'endloop' is reached.

command.name: endloop
command.summary: Marks the end of a loop block and returns control to the start of the loop.

command.name: method
command.summary: Defines a new method with a name and a body of commands.
command.param: The name of the method being defined.

command.name: endmethod
command.summary: Marks the end of a method's definition.
